Swipe.help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage.

Strike.help: You perform a deadly Strike with your claws. This is a basic attack that deals a moderate amount of lethal damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Slash.help: You Slash at your foe with your claws, dealing a good amount of lethal damage, but with a longer recharge rate than Swipe or Strike . This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast
Slash.targetHelp: The claws have reduced your Defenses.

Follow_Up.help: You perform a feint attack that deals moderate damage. After this attack hits, it gives you a large bonus Damage and chance to hit for a brief time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
Follow_Up.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} attack has increased your To-hit and Damage for a short duration.

Taunt.help: Taunt foes to attack you. Useful to pull enemies off allies and keep them attacking you to raise your Fury. A To-Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Fast

messages.attackerHit: You Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
You Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Taunts you!

Focus.help: Projects a burst of focused power over a short distance. Focus deals high damage and can possibly knock down your foe. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate
